summary:
Welcome!

''Goal = plan + action!''

Are you excited by having the perfect team fit or greatest job? I get energized by bringing ambitious professionals & companies together. I enjoy working out of a company's strategy reaching the best results while having fun, developing and creating new skills. Who doesn't want to have a satisfying job and be successful? 

Recruitment is my ambition. I prefer working in International environments and love the challenge of finding the best possible recruitment solutions for hiring managers. I enjoy working on large recruitment projects and cooperate along the way improving strategies. 

Specialities: recruitment, sourcing, interviewing, communication, relationship building/account management, successful meetings, employer branding, social media.

When I am not recruiting, networking or have fun with my colleagues, you can find me running, on the volleyball field (in- and outdoor), in nature for a great hike, practicing my language skills, writing blogs or meeting dearest and nearest. Besides that, travelling is my passion, so I travelled the world and there is still a lot to discover... 

Currently I add all my passion and experience into the recruitment goals of Coolblue (Energy)!

Do you want to be part of our winning team and experience our culture (simply amaze, slightly different, friends, flexible, just do it)? 
E-mail me: c.vkralingen@coolblue.nl 📩

Or feel free to connect. 🙋🏼‍♀️

profile_positions.title: Recruitment Trainer
Corporate Recruiter Tech

profile_positions.description:
Due to the introduction of Coolblue in Germany I flew in as a temporarily recruiter to set up Recruitment for our German HQ vacancies. My tasks and responsibilities:

★ Manage 10-12 new vacancies (intakes, interviews, assessments, marketing, sourcing, stakeholder management etc.)
★ Develop strategic and creative sourcing strategies using a combination of direct sourcing, online postings, referrals, networking, headhunting and other relevant methods;
★ Alignment with recruitment agencies
★ Action planning with the Marketing department to create (more) inflow
★ Presenting updates towards the German Management Team
★ Updating stakeholders on a weekly base about the status of their applications and suggest new strategies for creating more inflow
★ On-boarding dedicated German Recruiter

Positions hired:
- Product Managers
- Product Editors
- Translaters (NL-DE)
- Buyers
- Operational Manager Coolblue Delivers
profile_positions.title: Corporate Recruiter Germany

profile_positions.description:
Operating across five continents, in 30 countries, Robert Walters plc. is one of the worlds leading global specialist recruitment and recruitment outsourcing businesses. The Robert Walters brand stands for innovation, vision and leadership in the global recruitment market.

We specialize in permanent, interim and contract recruitment across all industry sectors, and count the world's leading investment banks and multinational blue-chip commercial organisations as clients. Operating at all levels of seniority we manage the careers of the best professionals in the accounting, finance, banking, legal, IT/technology, procurement, sales & marketing, HR, support and administration fields.

Responsibilities:
★ Maintain new and existing customer relations by regularly meeting them and inviting them to all kinds of events
★ Guide clients in their recruitment process by identifying the right candidates
★ Ensure that every step in the recruitment process goes according to our qualitative standards
★ Achieve set individual & team targets and KPI's within a rapidly evolving, competitive and commercial environment
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Consultant Finance
International Recruitment Consultant Sales

profile_positions.description:
★ VISJ (1 year pop-up, since September 2014) was a try-out concept. The success  of this vintage fish restaurant/bar translated into opening second locations in 2016. 
★ KOEJ (open since October 2015) was open for 2 years with a brand new concept and menu in the same memorable loft location.
140 couverts.

Duties:
★ Set-up restaurant & bar VISJ & KOEJ from scratch
★ Manage daily operations at restaurant/bar
★ Taking responsibility for the business performance of the restaurant
★ Train and supervise work crew for positive individual- and restaurant development
★ Place orders to restock merchandise and handle receiving of all products
★ Manage general & reservation email and telephone calls
★ Translate menu from Dutch into English
★ Encourage loyalty from guests

Extra:
★ Organizing marketing activities, such as promotional events and restaurant updates
★ Preparing/scheduling team division per daily shift
★ Responsible for handheld computers and cashier functions
★ Administrative responsibilities including processing hour and tip information for payroll and closing register
★ Responsible for employee administrative profiles + business clothes
★ Summarizing at weekly meetings
★ Planning and coordinating business menu’s (front of the house)
profile_positions.title: Manager + Hostess Visj & Koej (2x opening)

profile_positions.location: South America - New Zealand - Australia - South-East Asia - Nepal
profile_positions.description:
After my first full time job in Amsterdam, I realized I wanted to learn more, but in a different way than school or work. 
Besides interesting meetings with loads of different cultures and languages, this opportunity and experience has completed my independency and resolving powers. My vision and goals in life have been strongly extended, and thus I am able to understand and adapt in a large variety of situations.
profile_positions.title: World Traveller

profile_positions.description:
The 5-star InterContinental Wellington is located adjacent to the New Zealand capital's harbour waterfront. The hotel is recently completed a major refurbishment. High class service is their normal procedure.

Again, I was honoured to be part of the IHG-family. This well-organised hotelchain thought me inside outs about delivering the highest service possible. This perfect structured company gave me the opportunity to developed my attendance skills, language skills and letting me part of their crew within a few months.

Duties:
★ Assisting guests anytime they entered Club Lounge.
★ Have full knowledge of all VIPs arrivals + updating guest data in “Opera”.
★ Maintain a close working relationship with Guest Relations and Front Office.
★ Develop, build and utilize concierge/business center knowledge.
★ Adhere to all hygiene standards whilst completing necessary forms and returning them to  designated departments.
★ Ensure that all guests receive personal service to the highest degree of courtesy and to be informed of the hotel’s facilities.
★ Provide all guests with prompt and courteous service assuring complete guest satisfaction and guest retention.
★ Hand over any relevant information with necessary departments and associates through the use of handovers, logbook, daily packet and other tools.
★ Ensure that all guest concerns, complaints and compliments are resolved and addressed in an appropriate manner.
★ Assist Guests with general enquiries, arrange bookings, ticket reconfirmation and any other reasonable service requested by guests.
★ Ensure all guests are welcomed according to the Daily Packet arrival experience details.
★ Proactively offer Executive Level Services/up sell.
profile_positions.title: Club InterContinental Attendant (during World trip)

profile_positions.description:
The 4-star Crowne Plaza Amsterdam-South is set in a major new development area in Amsterdam: the Zuidas. This area is rapidly becoming a new urban centre devoted to international commerce and knowledge development. With Amsterdam Schiphol Int. Airport and the city centre only minutes away, the Crowne Plaza Amsterdam-South is one of the best situated hotels in Amsterdam for all guests, whether for business or pleasure.

2012:
This hotel is #13 of all hotels in The Netherlands on TripAdvisors Travellers Choice.
It reached #7 of best hotels chosen by guests in Amsterdam.

Duties:
★ Responding to guest needs and resolve any issues that may arise; supervise, direct and support reception and Guest Relations. 
★ Checking billing instructions and took action with the Property Management Systems (PMS) in emergency situation and be fully conversant with all hotel emergency procedures. 
★ Supervise the operations of the Front Office Department and coordinate operational efficiencies to meet Hotel budget targets. 
★ Oversee daily operations at the front desk, ensuring that the arrival and departure experience is smooth, efficient and in line with brand standards for all guests.
★ First hand for arriving guests and as such will need to perform to the highest standards.
★ Responding to guest needs and resolve any issues that arise confidently and independently as well as supporting other colleagues with difficult and challenging guest interactions.
★ Overseeing reception operations to ensure that all colleagues are well prepared and informed to deliver memorable guest experiences. 
★ Training as departmental training coordinator which included to be involved in the delivery of on job training for new and existing colleagues and as such will need to stay informed and up to date with new and emerging hotel and IHG policies, procedures and initiatives.

+ divers IHG hospitality trainings
profile_positions.title: Front Desk Jr. Supervisor and Departmental Trainer
